name: 陳盈均
objective:
本課程提供新興領域的知識 - 包含建築物的室內空氣品質 (IAQ)， 學習者將意識到保持適當室內空氣質量的重要性，舉例來說：污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62 標準之探討
This course provides advance knowledge of an emerging area – Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) in buildings. Learners will realize the importance of maintaining proper IAQ. Such as: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.
schedule:
Chapter 1. Introduction to Indoor air quality
Chapter 2. Indoor Pollutants and Sources
Chapter 3. Indoor Air Quality Act/Laws & Regulations
Chapter 4. Indoor Air Quality Monitoring: Test & Measure
Chapter 5. Improve Indoor Air Quality
Chapter 6. Green Building Materials 
Chapter 7. Ventilation, energy, and indoor air quality
Chapter 8. Air purifier and Filtration System 
Chapter 9. Introduction to Bioaerosols & Plants for Cleaning Indoor Air
Chapter 10. Vehicle interior air quality
Chapter 11. Indoor Air Quality Modeling
Chapter 12. Case Studies in Indoor Air Quality
scorePolicy:
Mid Term 30%
Homework 30%
participation 10%
Final project 30%
materials:
References:
1. Handout provides by the instructor
2. Indoor environmental quality: select proceedings of the 1st ACIEQ / edited by Arun Sharma, Radha Goyal, Richie Mittal. 2020

5. Air Pollution Modeling and its Application XXIII/ Editors: Steyn, Douw, Mathur, Rohit (Eds.)2015.
6. Indoor Air Pollution/ Editors: Peter Pluschke, Hans Schleibinger. 2018
7. Indoor and Outdoor Nanoparticles/ Editors: Mar Viana. 2016
8. News network or journal paper
